entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy and thunderstorms near midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
